title: Did a 15-Year-Old Invent a ‘100% Accurate’ Pancreatic Cancer Test?
subtitle: A prize-winning, high-school science project claiming to be a new diagnostic tool for cancer came with a lot of hype.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Jack Andraka, 15, came up with a “100 percent accurate” cancer-detection method that was “168 times faster, 26,000 times less expensive, and 400 times more sensitive” than current methods.
